summary: want any good change in map ,,then download this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=green]
Dynamic snow for Map
Yes it is compatible with " A Quality World map" mod
[/color][/size][size=3]
-Now this is the mod for the betterment of snow in Your world Map..
-Yes,this mod contains a normal map for a more dynamic view of snow
in Map
-Their are two types of Files,,Select the one you like by seeing the pictures [/size]

[color=green][size=3]
[b]Installation--[/b]
*Just download the file given by NMM OR Manually
*{For manual Downloders}--Now Copy the data folder Into your skyrim directory
*Replace any file if detect.
*Enjoy[/size][/color][color=yellow][size=3]
[/size]
For Feedback--
-Guys please upload the images that shows difference..
-Give Comments if you have any problem..
-And don"t Forget to endorse if you like it[/color]


Credits--
-Skyrim makers
-Nexus site
-And to all who downloaded this Mod[/size]
author: Hritik Vaishnav -SkyrimENB
